texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Attestation for Use of Supply Chain Assistance (SCA) Funding
texts.text: Attestation for Use of Supply Chain Assistance (SCA) Funding

texts.label: text
texts.orig: To assist school districts experiencing supply chain disruptions during SY 2021-2022, USDA has authorized funds referred to as Supply Chain Assistance (SCA) funds.  These funds are authorized under the Commodity Credit Corporation Act (15 U.S.C. 714).
texts.text: To assist school districts experiencing supply chain disruptions during SY 2021-2022, USDA has authorized funds referred to as Supply Chain Assistance (SCA) funds.  These funds are authorized under the Commodity Credit Corporation Act (15 U.S.C. 714).

texts.label: text
texts.orig: In order for districts to receive SCA funds certain conditions must be met:
texts.text: In order for districts to receive SCA funds certain conditions must be met:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The school food authority (SFA) must operate the National School Lunch Program (NSLP), authorized under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1751 et seq), and/or the School Breakfast Program (SBP) authorized under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1773), during SY 2021-2022.
texts.text: The school food authority (SFA) must operate the National School Lunch Program (NSLP), authorized under the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1751 et seq), and/or the School Breakfast Program (SBP) authorized under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 (42 U.S.C. 1773), during SY 2021-2022.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SFA must have experienced a supply chain disruption and an unanticipated financial burden resulting from the supply chain disruption.
texts.text: The SFA must have experienced a supply chain disruption and an unanticipated financial burden resulting from the supply chain disruption.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SFA will maintain all invoices, receipts, bids, contracts, and other documentation related to all purchases made with the SCA funds not fewer than five (5) years after the close of state fiscal year 2022.
texts.text: The SFA will maintain all invoices, receipts, bids, contracts, and other documentation related to all purchases made with the SCA funds not fewer than five (5) years after the close of state fiscal year 2022.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SFA will comply with all recordkeeping and review requirements 7 CFR 210.9(b)(17) and 7CFR 210.18, which includes maintaining documentation proving appropriate use of SCA funds
texts.text: The SFA will comply with all recordkeeping and review requirements 7 CFR 210.9(b)(17) and 7CFR 210.18, which includes maintaining documentation proving appropriate use of SCA funds

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SFA will comply with all applicable procurement and financial management regulations per 2CFR200.
texts.text: The SFA will comply with all applicable procurement and financial management regulations per 2CFR200.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SFA will make available all documentation of purchases related to the use of the SCA funds during the Administration Review and any other state or federal audit.
texts.text: The SFA will make available all documentation of purchases related to the use of the SCA funds during the Administration Review and any other state or federal audit.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The following are the only ALLOWABLE COSTS for the SCA funds:
texts.text: The following are the only ALLOWABLE COSTS for the SCA funds:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SCA funds must be used exclusively to purchase unprocessed or minimally processed domestic food products.
texts.text: The SCA funds must be used exclusively to purchase unprocessed or minimally processed domestic food products.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Foods purchased with SCA funds must be used in the NSLP, including Seamless Summer Option (SSO) and Afterschool Snack Programs, or SBP. (The SCA funds cannot be used to provide "fruit snack" to any students other than as a part of the Afterschool Snack Program.)
texts.text: Foods purchased with SCA funds must be used in the NSLP, including Seamless Summer Option (SSO) and Afterschool Snack Programs, or SBP. (The SCA funds cannot be used to provide "fruit snack" to any students other than as a part of the Afterschool Snack Program.)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SCA funds may be used to cover essential incidental costs related to the procurement of the unprocessed or minimally processed domestic food products, such as shipping, handling, packaging, that are part of the normal and customary price charged by a vendor for any given food product.
texts.text: The SCA funds may be used to cover essential incidental costs related to the procurement of the unprocessed or minimally processed domestic food products, such as shipping, handling, packaging, that are part of the normal and customary price charged by a vendor for any given food product.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: UNALLOWABLE COST for the SCA funds, include but are not limited to:
texts.text: UNALLOWABLE COST for the SCA funds, include but are not limited to:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Any processed food, including but not limited to the following:  pre-made pizza; baked goods, such as breads, muffins, crackers; pre-packaged sandwiches or meals; any prepared and/or pre-cooked items such as chicken nuggets or burritos, that come ready to eat or that require no further preparation beyond heating.
texts.text: Any processed food, including but not limited to the following:  pre-made pizza; baked goods, such as breads, muffins, crackers; pre-packaged sandwiches or meals; any prepared and/or pre-cooked items such as chicken nuggets or burritos, that come ready to eat or that require no further preparation beyond heating.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Labor
texts.text: Labor

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Equipment
texts.text: Equipment

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Indirect Costs or other Administrative Expenses
texts.text: Indirect Costs or other Administrative Expenses

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Any food of FOREIGN origin (Buy American does not apply.  DOMESTIC is MANDATORY.)
texts.text: Any food of FOREIGN origin (Buy American does not apply.  DOMESTIC is MANDATORY.)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · Any past expenditure (It is allowable to use SCA funds on new obligations or on bills for prior unpaid obligations that come due following the SFA's receipt of the SCA funds.)
texts.text: Any past expenditure (It is allowable to use SCA funds on new obligations or on bills for prior unpaid obligations that come due following the SFA's receipt of the SCA funds.)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: By signing below, I attest that:
texts.text: By signing below, I attest that:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · The SFA listed below and all schools under it's jurisdiction operating the NSLP and/or SBP will utilize the SCA as indicated above.
texts.text: The SFA listed below and all schools under it's jurisdiction operating the NSLP and/or SBP will utilize the SCA as indicated above.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · I understand that the USDA Q&A issued with Policy Memo SP-03-2022 and the Follow-Up QAs (as a result of the January 5th and 12th, 2022 State Agency Webinars) contain additional information, details and examples of allowable and unallowable expenses.
texts.text: I understand that the USDA Q&A issued with Policy Memo SP-03-2022 and the Follow-Up QAs (as a result of the January 5th and 12th, 2022 State Agency Webinars) contain additional information, details and examples of allowable and unallowable expenses.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · I understand that if unallowable purchases are made or if adequate documentation of purchases made using SCA funds are not available at the time of review, the district will be required to return those funds to USDA from a non-federal fund source.
texts.text: I understand that if unallowable purchases are made or if adequate documentation of purchases made using SCA funds are not available at the time of review, the district will be required to return those funds to USDA from a non-federal fund source.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · I understand that SCA funds will be distributed based on the published funding formula and that additional SCA funds may be available after original disbursements are made.
texts.text: I understand that SCA funds will be distributed based on the published funding formula and that additional SCA funds may be available after original disbursements are made.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: · I want to request an amount lower than the available allocation in the amount of $____________ (N/A if willing to accept entire district allocation, whole dollars only if opting for lower than allocated amount.)
texts.text: I want to request an amount lower than the available allocation in the amount of $____________ (N/A if willing to accept entire district allocation, whole dollars only if opting for lower than allocated amount.)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The form must be returned to Child Nutrition Unit at ADE.CNU-A-PS@ade.arkansas.gov by March 31, 2022
texts.text: The form must be returned to Child Nutrition Unit at ADE.CNU-A-PS@ade.arkansas.gov by March 31, 2022

texts.label: text
texts.orig: _____________________________________________ __________________________________  ___________________ Superintendents Signature Date Signed Child Nutrition Director Signature Date Signed _____________________________________________ _____________________________________________________ Superintendent Printed Name Child Nutrition Director Printed Name
texts.text: _____________________________________________ __________________________________  ___________________ Superintendents Signature Date Signed Child Nutrition Director Signature Date Signed _____________________________________________ _____________________________________________________ Superintendent Printed Name Child Nutrition Director Printed Name

texts.label: page_footer
texts.orig: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
texts.text: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
